member.name: T:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR
member.summary: Represents an Asprise OCR engine. API for Asprise OCR C#/VB.NET SDK. Visit http://asprise.com/product/ocr for more details.

members.member: Highest speed, accuracy may suffer - default option
less speed, better accuracy
lowest speed, best accuracy
Recognize text
Recognize barcode
Recognize both text and barcode
Output recognition result as plain text
Output recognition result in XML format with additional information if coordination, confidence, runtime, etc.
Output recognition result as searchable PDF
Common used languages eng (English)
spa (Spanish)
por (Portuguese)
deu (German)
fra (French)
Page type
Page type value: auto
Page type value: a single block of text
Page type value: a single column of text
Page type value: a single line of text
Page type value: a single word
Page type value: a single char
Page type value: scattered text
Limit charset to a set of predefined chars
Set to 'true' to set the output level as word instead of the default, line.
Image pre-processing type
Use system default
Default + page orientation detection
Custom, need to set PROP_IMG_PREPROCESS_CUSTOM_CMDS
Custom mage pre-processing command
table will be detected by default; set this property to true to skip detection.
default is 31 if not specified
Save intermediate images generated for debug purpose - don't specify or empty string to skip saving
PDF output file - required for PDF output. Valid prop value: absolute path to the target output file.
The DPI of the images or '0' to auto-detect. Optional. Valid prop value: 0(default: auto-detect), 300, 200, etc.
Font to be used for PDF output. Optional. Valid values: "serif" (default), "sans".
Make text visible - for debugging and analysis purpose. Optional. Valid prop values false(default), true.
Convert images into black/white to reduce PDF output file size. Optional. Valid prop values: false(default), true.
Set to 'text' or 'xml' to return information when the output format is PDF
Recognize all pages.
Do not change unless you are told so.
Do not change unless you are told so.

member.name: M:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.StartEngine(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Starts the OCR engine; does nothing if the engine has already been started.

member.name: M:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.StopEngine
member.summary: Stops the OCR engine; does nothing if it has already been stopped.

member.name: M:asprise_ocr_api.AspriseOCR.Recognize(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Performs OCR on the given input files.
member.param: comma ',' separated image file path (JPEG, BMP, PNG, TIFF)
-1 for all pages or the specified page (first page is 1) for multi-page image format like TIFF
-1 for whole page or the starting x coordinate of the specified region
-1 for whole page or the starting y coordinate of the specified region
-1 for whole page or the width of the specified region
-1 for whole page or the height of the specified region
valid values: RECOGNIZE_TYPE_TEXT, RECOGNIZE_TYPE_BARCODE or RECOGNIZE_TYPE_ALL.
additional properties, can be a single Dictionary object or inline specification in pairs. Valid property names are defined in this class, e.g., PROP_INCLUDE_EMPTY_BLOCK, etc.
member.returns: text (plain text, xml) recognized for OUTPUT_FORMAT_PLAINTEXT, OUTPUT_FORMAT_XML; empty for OUTPUT_FORMAT_PDF.

member.name: P:asprise_ocr_api.Properties.Resources.aocr_xsl
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method='html' version='1.0' encoding='utf-8' indent='yes'/> <xsl:template match="/asprise-ocr"> <HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE>Asprise OCR Result of <xsl:value-of select="@input"/> </TITLE> <style> body {background-color:lightgray; font-family: arial;} div.page {background-color: white; border: outset 3px #666;} div.pageNo {position: absolute; right [rest of string was truncated]";.
